index.singinEasy:
Sign up before processing your logs, it's quick and easy.
Then you'll be able to track your jobs and communicate more easily with the ezPAARSE team.
index.description: A free software that allows analysis,the enrichment and exploitation of access logs to electronic resources offered by web platforms of scientific literature publishers. It is a Web application with a form and a API allowing the manual and automatic ingestion of logs generated by the servers and proxies of the institutions.
index.fewClicksToInstall: A few clicks are enough to install it and analyze your logs.
index.contactUs: A problem, a question, a suggestion? Contact us!

process.explainationLogs: Indicate here the logs that you want ezPAARSE to analyze. Your logs may require special settings for ezPAARSE to understand them. If necessary, contact the ezPAARSE team for a configuration help.
process.explainationTestsLogs: You want to use test logs to validate your installation, we provide them on GitHub.

logFormat.firstLogLine: Based on the first log line

updates.updateDuration: Updating ezPAARSE can take several minutes. The server will be offline for the duration of the operation.

jobs.title: Ongoing processing(s)
jobs.infos: ezPAARSE has finished processing your logs. Macros Excel and LibreOffice are at your disposal if you wish to have a first visual overview of the results.

feedback.email: Your feedback will be sent to ezpaarse@couperin.org. A copy will be sent to you at the address indicated below.
